# Engineered Channel

## Summary
```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# Filter for the engineered channel component
eng_ch_risk <- filter(risk, COMPONENT == "Engineering Channel" | 
                            COMPONENT == "All")
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.width=7, fig.height=5, out.width='100%', fig.cap = paste0("Risk Characteristics (n = ", length(unique(eng_ch_risk$RISK_NO)), ")")}
p1 <- percent_treemap(eng_ch_risk, RISKCATEGORY, "Risk Categories")
p3 <- percent_treemap(eng_ch_risk, RISK_STRATEGY, "Risk Strategy")
p4 <- percent_treemap(eng_ch_risk, TIMING_OF_DELAY, "Timing of Delay")
p5 <- percent_treemap(eng_ch_risk, DISCIPLINE, "Discpline")
grid.arrange(p1, p3, p4, p5, nrow = 2, ncol = 2)
```
